participant_1.background:
My spouse works in the medical field, which allows me to enjoy my kittens and weekend adventures.
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.
I have a soft spot for poodles, so I would love to have a plush poodle in my nursery.
I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience.
I am glad that my wife's cancer is in remission and that she is able to enjoy the outdoors with me.

participant_2.background:
I ride horses in the countryside near my large school.
I dressed up as a cat last Halloween.
I am not sure of my ethnicity
I enjoy relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family.
I remember listening to my parents play music together when I was young.

content.text: Going well, thanks. My wife's cancer is in remission!
That's fantastic! I'm so happy for you both.
Thanks! We're celebrating by taking a weekend trip to New Orleans.
That sounds like fun! I've never been to New Orleans, but I've heard great things.
It's a great city! You should definitely go sometime.
I definitely will. I'm glad you're having a good time.
Thanks! I'm glad to hear that you're doing well, too.
I am. I'm enjoying my kittens and weekend adventures.
That sounds fun! I'm not sure what I would do without my horses.
I know what you mean. I love my cats.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
Not really. I might just relax at home with my cats.
That sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go riding in the countryside.
